Cross-Body Parry.name: Cross-Body Parry
Cross-Body Parry.flavor: As your foe swings, you quickly cross your blades to parry, then scissor those blades brutally into your attacker.
Cross-Body Parry.trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against you
Cross-Body Parry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Cross-Body Parry.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Cross-Body Parry.onHit: 1[W] damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Cross-Body Parry.weapon: If you’re wielding two light blades, two heavy blades, or a heavy blade and a light blade, each attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Misleading Bladework.name: Misleading Bladework
Misleading Bladework.flavor: Whirling your blades, you dance in and out of your enemies’ reach, knocking weapons aside and leaving foes off balance.
Misleading Bladework.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Misleading Bladework.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. Throughout the shift, each adjacent enemy takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and grants combat advantage to your allies until the start of your next turn.

Blade Dance.name: Blade Dance
Blade Dance.flavor: For a moment, you transform into a deadly storm of blades.
Blade Dance.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Blade Dance.effect: You can shift 3 squares and repeat the attack against a second target. You can then shift 3 squares and repeat the attack against a third target.
Blade Dance.weapon: If you’re wielding two light blades, two heavy blades, or a heavy blade and a light blade, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
